name: Digital Theft Drone
description:
This game was made for a game jam, but I missed the deadline by a longshot! So here it is, enjoy the game I kept making...

WASD to move

left click to shoot

right click to steal bitcoin

Escape to quit to menu

M to toggle minimap image.

Will you go in stealthy or loud, or a combo of both? Post speedrun times in comments with screenshots, please!
